text: kane-nnasu ummetev vahideten febe`ase-llahu-nnebiyyine mubessirine vemunzirin. veenzele me`ahumu-lkitabe bilhakki liyahkume beyne-nnasi fime-htelefu fih. veme-htelefe fihi ille-llezine utuhu mim ba`di ma caethumu-lbeyyinatu bagyem beynehum. fehede-llahu-llezine amenu lime-htelefu fihi mine-lhakki biiznih. vellahu yehdi mey yesau ila siratim mustekim
